FuncDef: This command enables and configures the rate for ICMP redirect messages issued on the router interface.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of ICMP redirect messages to send, expressed as a decimal integer. This parameter must be specified with the time parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
The time frame, in seconds, used to limit the number of ICMP redirect messages that can be issued, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 60.

ExtraInfo: Default: redirects 100 10 - Maximum of 100 redirect messages in 10 seconds.
